entities.description: The record of offenses associated with a particular ORI-Incident number.
The record of property incidents associated with a particular ORI-Incident number.
The frequency of occurrences of a particular offense or property incident.
The percentage representation of occurrences of a particular offense or property incident.
The raw count of occurrences without applying any weights.
A unique identifier for an incident reported by an Originating Reporting Agency (ORI).

relationships.description: Specifies the unweighted frequency of offense records per ORI-Incident number.
Specifies the percentage of offense records per ORI-Incident number.
Specifies the unweighted frequency of property incident records per ORI-Incident number.
Specifies the percentage of property incident records per ORI-Incident number.
Links a specific ORI-Incident number to its associated offense record.
Links a specific ORI-Incident number to its associated property record.
